title: Do Jungle Monsters do AD or AP damage?
body: Title^ curious to know to see is i can sub my MR glyphs for Cd or AS Glyphs and get the MR later in the game with my tank build

replies.body: They do physical damage, so MR won't reduce their damage at all.
what about dragon and baron, i have been told that they do magic damage in some of there attacks or something.. is that correct

Dragon attacks can pop banshee's veils since they act like Spells, but they only do physical damage.

Baron does a little bit of magic damage with his special attacks, but his is mainly a Physical damage source.
Both his specials (line spit and 3 shot spit) deal magic damage as well, not sure about his tentacle attack though.

then I'm curious to know when i go vi jungle, i normally get my ad runes with consist of the magic resist and i do a lot better against gromp and blue then when i take my ad runes but with cd instead of MR.. just curious, i don't know why..
just wondering... does gromp's poison do ad damage as well then? this may be a dumb q but just to clarify
His poison does AP, his attacks do AD
Jungle creeps deal physical damage (AD) so having/building armour reduces their damage.
